participant_1.background:
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
my favorite food is italian.
i have trouble losing weight.
I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right.
i am a scientist.

participant_2.background:
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy spending time with my horses and riding them.
i grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
i usually catch sunfish.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

content.text: Hey how are you?
Good, thanks for asking! How are you?
Doing great! I'm just about to start a nice cup of coffee.
I love coffee! I always have a cup in the morning.
Me too! What's your favorite kind?
I like dark roasts the best. They have the most flavor.
I like dark roasts too! I love the taste.
Me too! They're so good.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read and write. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That's nice! I like to read and write too. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
What do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I especially like to read science fiction and fantasy novels.
I like to read those too! I also like to read historical fiction and mystery novels.
Those are all good genres! I also like to read non-fiction books.
Non-fiction books are great! I like to learn new things.
Me too! I think learning new things is one of the best things about life.
I agree! It's so much fun to expand your mind and learn about new things.
I think so too! I love the feeling of learning something new.
Me too! It's the best
